text: The Guts World Tour is the ongoing second concert tour and first arena tour by the American singer-songwriter and actress Olivia Rodrigo in support of her second studio album, Guts (2023). It began on February 23, 2024, in Palm Springs, and will end on July 1, 2025, in Manchester, England. It is made up of 95 shows across North America, Europe, Asia and Australia. The tour has received positive reviews from critics. ==References== Category:2024 in music Category:Concert tours Category:Olivia Rodrigo
title: Guts World Tour
